title: How to unsubscribe from Fabletics
description: Fabletics is a subscription service that offers athletic wear. You can cancel your Fabletics VIP membership at any time without cancellation fees. To avoid being charged the monthly fee, you must cancel by the 5th of the month. You can cancel your membership online, by phone, or via live chat.

web.title: Cancel Fabletics Membership Online
web.description:
To cancel your Fabletics membership via the website:

*   Go to the Fabletics website (www.fabletics.com).
*   Log in to your account.
*   Go to "My Account" or "Membership Details."
*   Find the cancellation option.
*   Follow the prompts to cancel your membership.

phone.title: Cancel Fabletics Membership by Phone
phone.description:
To cancel your Fabletics membership by phone:

*   Call customer service at 1-844-FABLETICS (1-844-322-5384).

live_chat.title: Cancel Fabletics Membership via Live Chat
live_chat.description:
To cancel your Fabletics membership via live chat:

*   Use the live chat feature on the website to cancel.

seo_text: Learn how to easily cancel your Fabletics subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to end your Fabletics VIP membership and avoid unwanted charges. Cancel online, by phone, or via live chat.
